settings.banner_desc: See answers to our most frequently asked questions. If there is something you still have a question about, use our contact us form.

settings.head:
Frequently Asked
Questions
settings.desc: See answers to our most frequently asked questions. If there is something you still have a question about, use our contact us form.

settings.question: Where is ZeLaZe made?
settings.answer: We manufacture our products in the USA.

settings.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.answer: You can expect your order to be delivered between 3-5 business days, delivered using USPS.

settings.question: How are your products different from other skincare brands?
settings.answer:
1) We formulate using South East Asian root extracts and botanicals that have been used throughout history to brighten and sooth skin.

2) We are selective when in choosing our active ingredients. There are 5 types of Vitamin C and we specifically choose Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate to formulate with because it is:

a) Most effective in brightening the skin.

b) Least irritating on skin

c) Most stable form of Vitamin C

3) This dualistic approach to formulation is tested for real results!

settings.question: Do your products contain any animal products or derivatives?
settings.answer: Our products are vegan-friendly and cruelty-free. We do not test on animals or use any animal components or by-products.

settings.question: What sets ZeLaZe’s approach to addressing hyperpigmentation apart from other skincare brands?
settings.answer: At Zelaze, our expertise lies in hyperpigmentation innovation and our goal is to deliver the highest performance ingredients and formulations in a format that can be easily received by the skin. Our products are formulated with the duality of actives and natural root extracts(Turmeric and Ginseng) to maintain a balance to keep the skin calm and healthy, allowing for optimal usage and visible results without any unpleasant side effects.

settings.question: How often should I use the moisturizer?
settings.answer: Twice. Daily and Night

settings.question: Can I use the moisturizer if my skin is easily irritated?
settings.answer: Yes, our products are formulated to work with sensitive skin.

settings.question: Do you use essential oils in your formulations?
settings.answer: We do not.

settings.question: How do I place an order?
settings.answer:
Placing an order with us is easy! Here's how:

1. Browse our website and select the products you would like to purchase.

2. Add the products to your shopping cart by clicking on the "Add to Cart" button.

3. Once you have added all the products you want to purchase, click on the shopping cart icon.

4. Review your order to ensure that everything is correct and then click on the "Checkout" button.

5. Fill in your shipping and billing information and select a shipping method.

6. Review your order again and click on the "Place Order" button.

7. You will be directed to our secure payment gateway where you can complete your purchase using your preferred method of payment.

settings.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept a variety of payment methods to make your checkout experience as smooth and convenient as possible. We accept all major credit and debit cards, including Visa, MasterCard, American Express. We also accept payments via PayPal, Amazon Pay, and other forms of payments offered by Shopify Checkout.

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: We are launching with free shipping on all orders!

settings.question: Are there any discounts available?
settings.answer: Subscribe to our emails for offers and promotions!

settings.question: How can I request a refund?
settings.answer: Email us at hello@zelazeskin.com

settings.question: Can you explain your refund policy or money back guarantee?
settings.answer:
If you’re not happy with Zelaze, we gladly offer a 14-day Money Back Guarantee!

All returns must be processed within 14 days of the delivery date. Returns and processing vary depending on the shipping location. Customer is responsible to pay for the return shipping.

settings.question: How long does it take for my order to be delivered?
settings.answer: You can expect your order to be delivered between 3-5 business days, delivered using USPS.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Not yet! But we are working on it.
